name: Baserow
description: Open source online no-code database and Airtable alternative. More information about persistent files on S3, scaling and installing a custom domain can be found on https://baserow.io/docs/guides/installation/install-on-heroku.

SECRET_KEY.description: A unique string that is used to generate secrets.

BASEROW_PUBLIC_URL.description: The public URL of your Heroku Baserow app. If empty, the default Heroku app URL is used, but if it differs then it must be changed. (eg. https://baserow-test.com).

BASEROW_AMOUNT_OF_WORKERS.description: The amount of workers per dyno. This value must be `1` if you want to run the free plan.
